But then you can only work on the cities other than the national capital. In this case, you will start recieving salary right after getting the soldier degree. You thought about the proposal for a moment and then you decided to answer the minister. "Sir, I am very grateful for your proposal. But the truth is my family doesn't have much good financial conditions and the main earner of my family, my father is a small business man. The loss in business has stressed him out and he is very sick. So I would like to pursue a degree from Alestrex High University so that I could receive money to sustain my family as soon as possible.Minister respected your choice and said something that brought happiness on your sad face. "Don't you worry kiddo. Do you know all students who have passed the high school can pursue the soldier degree in the university for free. After that you said goodbye to the Minister and left as you have to fill the application form for university.
